note.title: &susemgr; Version Information
note.para: In this manual if not other specified, &susemgr; version &productnumber; is assumed and this version is required if a feature is discussed. &susemgr; &productnumber; and &susemgr; &productnumber; Proxy were originally released as a SLES 12 SP3 extension. Whenever features of the &susemgr; &productnumber; host operating system are documented and not other specified version 12 SP3 is assumed.
